





..
    Classes and methods

Class ambrosia_web.filter.Comparison
================================================================================

..
   class-title


A comparison. Used by the parser.








    


Constructor
-----------

.. js:class:: ambrosia_web.filter.Comparison(p1, op, p2)



    
    :param  p1: 
        the first value that is compared 
    
    :param  op: 
        the compare operation 
    
    :param  p2: 
        the sencond value
